name: Diamond Sea Hotel
detail: From airport to hotel taken around 18 mins by taxi. The beach I front of the hotel which you can have 180 degree Sea view if book a room with sea view. Unfortunately When I booked with Agoda, there is no mentioning about the room type, our room was no view, just face to a wall. And the drains of the sink was way too slow, seems something blocked. The best thing was no noise from outside even our room just fight in front of the elevator. We have a great trip in Da Nang.

name: Awaken Danang Hotel
detail: They made our trip to Vietnam an absolute pleasure.
area: Ph∆∞·ªõc M·ªπ,Da Nang - View on map

name: Ocean Haven Hotel
detail: I like it ! The hotel is suitable for both tourists and businessmen for a short and long stay. Good location, a few minutes walk to the sea. Large room with cityview . Useful staff. A varied breakfast (buffet). Very reasonable price per room. Nearby there are a huge number of cafes and fast delicious food items. In general, I recommend. I will be back .
area: Ph∆∞·ªõc M·ªπ,Da Nang - View on map

name: G8 Luxury Hotel and Spa Da Nang
detail: We have choosen GIC LUXURY HOTEL after reading the good reviews. New hotel just few months old. Staffs are all friendly and helpful. We would like to thank front desk Chi and Vinh for their assistance to our enquiries. Room is not too spacious after adding extra bed, nevertheless it is clean and well lighted. We seldom see hotel room which was so brightly lighted Breakfast is good with a mixture of Vietnamese food and breads and rice rolls. About 10mins walk to Con Market & Big C supermarket. Rather far to Han Market. But with the Grab taxi, it is not an issue to travel around Da Nang. Nearby hotel does not have much restaurant except KFC & Lotteria Cafe. Round the corner of hotel, there is cafe shop XIU CAFE which was lovely decorated. A must to have a rest there and enjoy the coffee with such a nice ambience. If you like desserts - Sweet Soup, a walking distance about 5min from hotel, do try CHE XUAN TRANG.Most of the desserts cost about VND12000.
area: H·∫£i Ch√¢u,Da Nang - View on map

name: Dylan Hotel Danang
detail: I just wanna express how happy and grateful I was during my recent 3 days staying (with 3 of my grand-children) at the Dylan Hotel. The hotel is 5 min walk to the beach and located on a busy street with various types of stores, restaurants, health spas... Breakfast menu was good. We were satisfied with the hotel/room cleanliness. All the hotel workers (front desk, room service people, waitresses...) were nice and helpful. I was impressed with their hospitality and services which was exceeding my expectation. I‚Äôve made multiple inquiries about the local area on various topics. Special thanks to the two young receptionists - Ms. Trinh, Ms. Khuong - all of my questions were answered. They are so kind, knowledgeable and patient, always treating their hotel guests with respected polite manners. I would come back to stay in this very same hotel again and again whenever I happen to be in Da Nang.
area: Ph∆∞·ªõc M·ªπ,Da Nang - View on map

name: Muong Thanh Luxury Da Nang hotel
detail: My Group 14paxs booked 6 rooms. All rooms are spacious, clean, cosy, comfortable, well-furnished with ocean view. Impressed by fast services checking in/out. Fairly new nice beachfront hotel with excellent ocean view. 40th floor provided excellent city and ocean views. Staff always helpful, delightful and proficient in English. No communication issue. Swimming pool is large with brilliant views. Breakfast has lot of selections. We thanked and extended our great appreciation to staff, Mr Le Quang Vinh, who constantly went above and beyond his duties to ensure we were satisfied, happy and made all relevant infrastructure arrangements for us. We got free upgrade to Grand Suite Room which is very spacious with ocean view. Great job to all the staff and Muong Thanh Luxury Da Nang Hotel. Overall we had a great experience and enjoyable times staying in this hotel. We truly enjoyed our stay here and we surely will come back.
area: Ph∆∞·ªõc M·ªπ,Da Nang - View on map

name: DLG Hotel Danang
detail: A lot of positives with this hotel: 1. Location is right on the beach. There are a few clusters of big hotels on the beach, and this once actually sits in between the clusters, so the part of the beach is less busy than most. 2. 2 swimming pools, one on the ground floor, one on the third floor. Both are excellent. 3. Good value for money. Rooms are clean, service is good.

name: Stella Maris Beach Danang
detail: The hotel staffs are very helpful and friendly. Good facilities, new design. Everything is new. The Bed and pillow is very comfortable. Rooftop swimming pool and bar is very cool, can view My Khe Beach and City. Walking distance to beach. It‚Äôs just a small issue that my room doesn‚Äôt have soap for 3 days, I thought its supposed to be like that. But at the 4th day, I asked them, n i got soap. üòÅ Housekeepers forget to place it in my room, i guess!!! I try Spa in hotel too. Everything is great. I hope they will keep it up!! Creat the good image of Vietnam. I was really impressed.

name: Chicland Danang Beach Hotel
detail: This was my first time visiting Vietnam. Coming to Da Nang was a last minute choice and therefore, so was reserving a room at Chicland Hotel and doing so was the best decision I could have made. My partner and I never felt more welcomed and safe in a environment that wasn‚Äôt home. From the hospitality, the room and service, and the shear kindness from these host, made our trip much more memorable. If I‚Äôm ever in Da Nang again I will only book a room at Chicland Hotel.
